description: Enterprise techniques used by Dyre, ATT&CK software S0024 v1.2
name: Dyre (S0024)

techniques.comment: Dyre uses HTTPS for C2 communications.[1]
Dyre registers itself as a service by adding several Registry keys.[1]
Dyre decrypts resources needed for targeting the victim.[1]
Dyre has a command to download and executes additional files.[1]
Dyre injects into other processes to load modules.[1]
Dyre can detect sandbox analysis environments by inspecting the process list and Registry.[1]
